data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the state of Belgorod a passion to plant another simple church.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Belgorod, Russia

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Belgorod, Russia so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.section_summary: On average, 181 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Belgorod, Russia.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Belgorod, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Belgorod, Russia.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Aghul people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Aghul people know you.
Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 1,511,600 citizens of the the state of Belgorod.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Belgorod, Russia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 641,045, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.
